text: @ryrytal @XENONexperiment Both domains of research are still in the theoretical phase. Dark Stars haven’t been observed, and Solar Axion is still a probability not yet fully tested. Also dark matter experiments on earth have to deal with gravity which somehow disturb the outcome.

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain
